mapper.select: select year,branchName,branchAddress,count(*) as terminalAmount from ( select distinct year(operation_time) as year,branch_name as branchName,branch_address as branchAddress,terminal_no from zdsj2 ) temp group by year,branchName,branchAddress order by year asc

select distinct DATE_FORMAT(operation_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date,branch_name as branchName,branch_address as branchAddress,count(*) as work from zdsj2 group by date,branchName,branchAddress order by date asc

select year,branchName,branchAddress,count(*) as operationAmount from ( select year(operation_time) as year,branch_name as branchName,branch_address as branchAddress from zdsj2 ) temp group by year,branchName,branchAddress order by year asc
